commit.message:
Set the handler with the basic config (#911)

Calling basicConfig without a handler installs a default handler which
results in printing the message twice with different formats.

Calling basicConfig without a handler installs a default handler which
results in printing the message twice with different formats.

commit.message:
Add log messages which are captured by the CI (#904)

If gcovr is executed in Azure pipeline or GitHub actions a additional
logging handler is installed which prints warning and error  message
in a format detected by the CI system.

tree ebaac5431e55d0f35b11cc6dcbdcc4be70645899

logging handler is installed which prints warning and error  message
in a format detected by the CI system.

commit.message:
Improve tests on macos clang (#902)

* Activate all tests for MacOs
* Rewrite decision test for clang on MacOs
  The local enum with fully qualified name isn't working. The test was
  introduced because of a bug when a case use the scope operator,
  therefor the enum is moved to a namespace.
* Update reference data for MacOs
* Upload coverage data for MacOs
* Generic improvements:
  * Clean all temporary files from tests
  * Fix the reference directory to update
  * Fix pipeline warning
  * Add support to import several ZIP files

verification.payload:
tree 1ceede5d5a629d85cef6da1a94b27b27f6db9a1d
parent 2cfcb7ca648c201f129d0d8d9b093d4c1b2d28b7
author Michael Förderer <40258682+Spacetown@users.noreply.github.com> 1709587622 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1709587622 +0100

Improve tests on macos clang (#902)

* Activate all tests for MacOs
* Rewrite decision test for clang on MacOs
  The local enum with fully qualified name isn't working. The test was
  introduced because of a bug when a case use the scope operator,
  therefor the enum is moved to a namespace.
* Update reference data for MacOs
* Upload coverage data for MacOs
* Generic improvements:
  * Clean all temporary files from tests
  * Fix the reference directory to update
  * Fix pipeline warning
  * Add support to import several ZIP files

commit.message:
Add macOS to GitHub tests (#901)

* Add MacOs test runner with clang based gcc (preinstalled compiler) and gcc-13 (compiler installed by GitHub).
* Handle different compiler executables. Always detect the compiler version to use for the reference data.
* Deactivate decision test for MacOs runner
* Skip screenshot generation on MacOs because no docker available

commit.message:
Improve coverage and generate report locally (#891)

If test with active coverage is executed in local environment a HMTL report is generated. In this case also failing tests are ignored.

If test with active coverage is executed in local environment a HMTL report is generated. In this case also failing tests are ignored.

commit.message:
Add support for clover format (#888)

- The file metrics are also used for the class metrics.
- The values are inherited to package and project values.
- Add clover format to documentation.
- Reorder the output formats to list first the own formats and then the
  other formats ordered alphabetical.
- Fix wrong links and extend others.

commit.message:
Add session to generate screenshots from html (#877)

The used tool doesn't support CSS variables and isn't maintained anymore.
The screenshots are now generated by a server running in a docker container
which uses a headless Chrome to render the HTML.

- Generate screenshots if documentation isn't build in a container
- If documentation is generated in the pipeline fail if files are
  modified.
- Replace deprecated options in examples and update them to fit to the documentation text.
- Always use CRLF for CSV files and document this.

verification.payload:
tree e8a7459583312d8b61c12ae410332431743f8909
parent 1c0e1d5a603586f01d6cad686efd1aedb9ba0400
author Michael Förderer <40258682+Spacetown@users.noreply.github.com> 1708092052 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1708092052 +0100

Add session to generate screenshots from html (#877)

The used tool doesn't support CSS variables and isn't maintained anymore.
The screenshots are now generated by a server running in a docker container
which uses a headless Chrome to render the HTML.

- Generate screenshots if documentation isn't build in a container
- If documentation is generated in the pipeline fail if files are
  modified.
- Replace deprecated options in examples and update them to fit to the documentation text.
- Always use CRLF for CSV files and document this.
